tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It may be pertinent to note that here That confidence here generated in dr rampal knowledge and his advice decided in my going for further dental treatment as I was very much reluctant in further dental treatment due to trigeminal injury in other dental center during extract ion  of wisdom tooth           he not only help in in my  suffering but gently helped in solving my different dental issues such as removing cape Planted on other molar which was giving tremendous uneasiness as it was stuck 
And then with His team of dental doctors he provided dental lmplantsl   am quiet  well satisfied I wish him all the best and good luck

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been visiting Dr.(Wg .Cdr.) N. Rampal for dental problems for the last 15 years or so. I always found him with a smile while greeting patients.  When one meets an attentive and ever-smiling senior Consultant, half the problem is over.  The rest can be resolved with utmost care and attention provided to the patient.  Overall, I must admit that I have made the best choice by going to Dr. Rampal instead of visiting AIIMS(from where I superannuated as Principal Private Secretary to Director, AIIMS and am entitled to  get treatment). 
 I can safely recommend Dr. Rampal to my acquaintances.
